data.detail: Sony PS5® Console Video Game Digital - Fortnite Bundle (Slim)
about: Slim Design: Sleek and compact console with powerful gaming technology.
1TB Ultra-High Speed SSD: Near-instant load times and ample storage for your games.
Ray Tracing & 4K-TV Gaming: Realistic lighting, shadows, and stunning visuals on 4K displays.
Up to 120fps & HDR: Smooth gameplay with high frame rates and vibrant, lifelike colors.
Tempest 3D AudioTech: Immersive audio that brings your gaming environment to life.
Haptic Feedback & Adaptive Triggers: Dynamic sensory feedback and resistance for a realistic controller experience.
Integrated I/O: Custom system integration for rapid data access and innovative game design.
Ultra-high speed SSD enables lightning fast loading times for games.
Immersive gameplay with haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio support.
All-digital console: No disc drive; buy and download games directly from PlayStation Store.
Powered by custom CPU, GPU, and Integrated I/O for next-gen performance.
Stunning graphics and new PS5 features; also supports a back catalog of select PS4 games.
Immersive gameplay with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for realistic in-game sensations.
Built-in microphone, 3.5mm headset jack, and dedicated mute button for easy online chat and voice control.
Comfortable, iconic design with enhanced sticks, integrated motion sensor, and high-fidelity built-in speaker.
Connect via USB Type-C or Bluetooth to play on PS5, PC, Mac, and mobile devices; stream games using PS Remote Play.

data.detail: Story@Home Long Door Curtains 9 Feet Long Set of 1 | Bohemian Cotton Curtains | Birds Printed | Light Filtering Curtain for Living Room | (116 x 275 cm, Lemon Blue) | Perfect for Home Decor
about: Package includes 1 piece of Bohemian Long Door Curtain measuring 116 x 275 cm (46 x 108 inches), made of 100% cotton canvas fabric with a birds pattern in pale yellow & blue.
Versatile 9 feet long curtains suitable for use as blinds, decorative backdrops, or green screens in living rooms, bedrooms, offices, and more.
Gently filters natural light to create a warm, cozy ambiance while reducing glare, balancing privacy and brightness effectively.
Energy-efficient design helps regulate indoor temperature by blocking heat in summer and retaining warmth in winter, also providing soundproofing benefits.

Statues represent contemplation of the past, present, and future, making them a meaningful piece of art for home decor and collection.
Crafted from high-quality resin, these abstract art pieces are smooth, comfortable to touch, easy to clean, and non-toxic.
Perfect for decorating living rooms, bedrooms, offices, bookshelves, hotels, and more; complements any decor or festive setting.

data.detail: Bergmann Typhoon Heavy Duty Metal Car Tyre Inflator (Blue)
about: Solid all-metal body ensures durability, reliability, and reduced noise compared to plastic inflators.
Metal construction radiates heat better, minimizing wear and tear and lowering noise and vibration.
Powerful 150W pure copper motor enables superfast inflation—0 to 30 psi in around 2 minutes for a 145/70 R12 tyre.
Built-in high-precision analog pressure gauge with rubber bumper for accurate, battery-free readings and long life.
